name: Chiron
notes: Chiron is a Centaur (minor planet 2060 Chiron)
Discovered by Charles T. Kowal on November 1, 1977
Orbits between Saturn and Uranus with high eccentricity
Shows both asteroid and comet characteristics
Close encounters with Saturn cause chaotic orbit evolution
Elements based on JPL Small-Body Database documentation
Epoch chosen near current date for best accuracy
sources: Physical parameters from Kowal et al. studies
created_by: Manual compilation for ephemeris accuracy experiment
